wordpressPage.title: Residential Workshop
wordpressPage.content:
Welcome to our Residential Workshop page. You’ve probably reached this link because you attended a residential workshop led by Mark Tiddy and/or Phil Simpson.

Here you can download the presentation and notes from our workshop plus find links to other useful resources for your residentials. If you have any questions please use the ‘Contact Us‘ page.
